name: Nelson Alarm
address: Multiple locations, including 4930 W. 71st Street, Indianapolis, IN 46268
description: Nelson Alarm has been providing security systems and 24/7 alarm monitoring for homes and businesses in Indianapolis for nearly 30 years. They offer custom-designed solutions, including burglary and fire protection, carbon monoxide, and medical alerts

name: Circle City Security Systems Inc.
description: A locally owned and operated full-service security company in Indianapolis, Circle City Security Systems has been providing residential and commercial security since 1976. They offer 24/7 real-time monitoring with a well-trained team and quality equipment

name: Indiana Alarm
address: Multiple locations, including 7135 Corporate Way, Indianapolis, IN 46278
description: Indiana Alarm is a locally owned and operated company with over 20 years of experience in Central Indiana. They offer security and automation equipment from top manufacturers and a US-based monitoring station, with no long-term contracts required

name: Alert Alarm Inc.
description: Alert Alarm has been providing security systems and 24/7 local monitoring in Northwest Indiana for over 50 years. They offer a range of protection systems, including fire alarms, burglar alarms, and security cameras, with smart technology integration

name: Live Wire Alarm
description: Live Wire Alarm provides comprehensive security solutions for residential and commercial properties in Martinsville, Indiana, with state-of-the-art alarm systems and 24/7 monitoring services. They emphasize expert installation and affordable plans

name: ADS (Alarm Detection Systems, Inc.)
address: 1000 N. Lake St., Aurora, IL 60506 (Corporate Headquarters)
description: ADS is a large security and fire safety firm founded in 1968, serving Indiana, Illinois, Wisconsin, and Colorado. They offer state-of-the-art systems and 24/7/365 peace of mind, with a five-diamond certified central monitoring station

name: Securitas Technology
address: Multiple locations, including 130 S. Range Line Rd., Carmel, IN 46032
description: Securitas Technology provides commercial security services throughout Indiana, offering business alarm systems, intrusion detection, video surveillance, access control, fire detection, and 24/7 monitoring support. They focus on customized solutions

name: Guardian Protection Services, Inc.
address: Multiple locations, including 7777 W. Washington St., Indianapolis, IN 46231
description: Guardian Protection is a large privately-held security company offering smart home security and small business security. They provide an extensive array of security and monitoring services, focusing on life safety and property monitoring

name: Mytech Security
address: 4974 E County Rd 400 S, Plainfield, IN 46168
description: Mytech Security is a family-owned and operated business with over 40 years of experience providing security and fire detection systems for residential and commercial properties across Indiana. They offer 24/7 monitoring services with a 1-year warranty on parts and labor

name: General Emergency Monitoring (GEM)
description: General Emergency Monitoring is a UL-listed Central Station offering personal support and quick response times from trained professionals. They specialize in providing reliable monitoring services for businesses and have an average response time under 20 seconds
